code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const{login}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');setLoading(true);try{await login(email,password);navigate('/profile');}catch(error){console.error('Login Error:',error);if(error.response){switch(error.response.status){case 401:setError('Invalid email or password.
